# How Long?

> A sleek, minimalist date distance calculator that tells you how much time has passed — or remains — between two dates.

## What It Does

- Calculates the distance between two dates in years, months, days, weeks, and hours
- Works bidirectionally: past dates show "ago", future dates show "until"
- Defaults to comparing a selected date against today
- Supports a custom "from" date for arbitrary date-to-date calculations
- Displays contextual fun facts (heartbeats, Mars orbits, etc.)
- Shareable via URL parameters: `?date=2023-05-14&from=2024-01-01`

## Tech Stack

- React 19 with React Compiler
- TypeScript 5.9
- Vite 7
- Tailwind CSS v4
- date-fns for date calculations
- Framer Motion for animations

## Features

- Dark/light theme toggle (dark default)
- Glass-morphism UI aesthetic
- Copy result to clipboard
- Share via Web Share API or URL copy
- Keyboard shortcut: Cmd/Ctrl+K to focus date input
- Remembers last date via cookies
- URL-encoded shareable links
- Fully responsive and mobile-friendly
